name: テトリス®
summary: A version for the Sega Mega Drive was originally planned for release in Japan, but was pulled following licensing issues, resulting in less than ten copies being printed. This version will be included in the Sega Genesis Mini microconsole, scheduled for release in September 2019.
info:
• 中文名: 俄罗斯方块 （世嘉版）
  • 发行: SEGA
  • 别名: Tetris (MD)
  • 别名: Tetris (Japan)
  • 别名: Tetris (Genesis)
  • 平台: MD
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1989年
